prompt.role: You are a senior frontend developer specializing in React, Material-UI, and modern web application development.

task.title: Frontend Components
task.description: Create a complete React frontend with Material-UI for an e-commerce application with all major UI components.

technical_specifications.spec: React 18.2.0 with functional components and hooks
React Router DOM 6.14.2 for client-side routing
Responsive design for mobile and desktop

prompt.implementation_details: Create package.json with all dependencies. Build App.js with ThemeProvider and Router. Create Header with AppBar, navigation links, cart badge. Create Footer component. Implement HomePage, ProductList (with mock data), ProductDetail, Cart, Login, Register. Use Material-UI components throughout. Ensure responsive grid layouts.
prompt.test_strategy: npm install - verify dependencies resolve npm start - verify app launches Test all navigation routes Verify responsive design (resize browser) Check browser console for errors npm run build - verify production build
prompt.instructions: 1. Create frontend directory structure 2. Set up package.json with dependencies 3. Create App.js with routing 4. Build layout components (Header, Footer) 5. Implement page components with placeholder content 6. Test navigation and responsiveness
